People isn't really bank people Impossible to receive when problems Response at mail are very often incoherent and usefulness, no interest, problem understanding when demand no indicate name because lots problem, proces, saboted, block accounts...Families condamned at indemnity compensate and receive nothing, identity thief very often Recommend physical bank except french bank postal always scammers that really worst than bourso bank No need invest in this bank Boursorama a few years ago was very better Fortunately app is very great, lots possibility but sometimes impossible to unlock some accounts, progress is possible

I strongly advise against using this neo bank. I transferred ‚Ç¨1,500 from my PayPal account to my Boursorama account, and my account has been locked for three weeks now (and it's still locked). I've contacted customer service daily, but they've been unable to provide any further information or resolve the issue. i've had to rely on friends and family to transfer money to cover my rent and other bills since I've been unable to use my bank card or make any transfers. They asked me to send documents to prove the transfer which i did the same day i received the mail and 2 weeks later (after calling them everyday) they told me that they lost the documents??? This level of incompetence is unacceptable; I've never encountered a bank that leaves its customers stranded without solutions. The worst part is that they never once reached out to me; I was the one constantly chasing them for answers. My advice is to steer clear at all costs.

titre_com: I would not recommend Orange Bank
commentaire: I would not recommend Orange Bank. Currently I am trying to transfer some funds from my account to another bank. They take the money from your account but do not transfer it. Then, 4 days later, they send an email telling you the transfer needs validating. However there is no way to validate the transfer in the application. So you have to ask the AI for help, who eventually connects you with a service advisor. I was connected to 'Sarah Conseiller 76' who was unable to help, and told me I have to wait another 48 hours to speak with an advisor who can validate the payment. When I questioned why, she ended the conversation by disconnecting me. A highly questionable way to deal with customers.

Initially everything was fine, but after my second transaction (something I sold online through platform and received a payment from someone) things went down quickly.Firstly, sumeria or Lydia, frozen my account for verification. Started asking quastions about both parties, such as identity card and handwritten note about the purchase.Asked for various proofs of acquisition and answering once a day at most.I explained that the person who bought the product didn't want his identity card sent anywhere.Now after a week of back and forth messages (they say the average time to solve these kind of questions is 24hours, what a joke), the bank completely left me out of my account, being not possible to access the app at all, no reason was given by any mean of communication and I have around 1k euro which sumeria holds now.Now, after paying the service (black card), having some money on account, they block your account, have your money, will obviously get payments for the monthly subscription without hesitation and won't even contact you. What a joke of a service and customer support. Please stay away from this nonsense and just opt for the Revolut.

titre_com: The worst bank I have ever worked with
commentaire: The worst bank I have ever worked with.  They are unreachable. They allow you to sign up for appointments and then they don‚Äôt honor them (3 in a row for us), don‚Äôt answer emails, don‚Äôt respond by telephone, don‚Äôt permit you to make transfers, and are blocking our nearly 8000 euros. This is not a business bank. It‚Äôs clearly a scam.
reponses:
Hi,

Thank you for your feedback, although it is negative.

We are deeply sorry for the inconvenience. Unfortunately, your package does not give you access to our telephone line. This is why our internal messaging service is available to answer all your questions.

If you wish to have access to our customer service on the phone, we invite you to subscribe to the EASY package. Here is a comparison of our rates: https://www.anyti.me/fr/tarifs/.

We remain at your disposal,

Barbara - Anytime

titre_com: Everything was great until you sign up
commentaire: I initially gave a good review to anytime as they were great when we set up the account, which is for a new association. Our association raises money for people with rare diseases in Ukraine impacted by the war.  Now that it's time to send the money to the beneficiaries, we're told that you can only make transfers to SEPA countries with an IBAN number. Even countries outside of SEPA who have affiliated banks in the EU are no good because anytime won't let you make transfers using Swift anymore.  Since joining they have also completely disabled features to get or send cheques. (This may seem like not a big deal, until someone wants to make you a donation).  When you ask for help you get annoying AI generated responses inviting you to 'find another solution' but 'rest assured, you can still make a transfer via iban in SEPA.'  This account is very expensive for what it is. It's basically a scam. They understood where and how I wanted to send transfers when i set up the account and now there is literally nothing I can do except send the money to my personal account-so what's the point. Traditional French banks are slower and they don't like to open small association accounts so they will try to put you off, but honestly it's worth the hassle because this 'bank' really is not fit for purpose.
reponses:
Hi Michael,

We appreciate your initial positive review and we're truly sorry to hear about your recent experiences with our services. We understand the importance of the work your association is doing to support those affected by rare diseases in Ukraine during these challenging times, and we apologize for any inconvenience you've encountered.

Our goal is to provide a reliable and efficient banking experience, and it's disheartening to hear that we've fallen short of your expectations.

We understand that you've encountered difficulties with international transfers outside the SEPA region. We acknowledge that this limitation can be frustrating, and we're actively exploring ways to expand our international transfer options to better serve our diverse customer base.

We apologize for the inconvenience you've faced with the disabled cheque features. While cheques have become less common in today's digital banking landscape, we recognize that they still hold value in certain situations. We will review the possibility of reinstating this feature or providing an alternative solution.

Thank you for bringing these issues to our attention, and we hope to have the opportunity to regain your trust in the future.

Sincerely,

Barbara - Anytime

commentaire: Very bad service. They are not clear about the requirements (French/EU nationals only accepted) when a UK based business wants to setup a subsidiary. Everything is fine until we make the payment to open the Capital Deposit account, and it gets rejected after 2-3 days. I paid 3 times and got rejected. End of the day, they do not accept any UK based element - shareholder, director, manager, passport, address - and just need a French national with French residency. Not sure how much they harass non-EU/EEA (Asian/African) businesses trying to establish in France/EU. This is not a requirement of the Registrar of Companies, but the bank has made it mandatory only to punish us for Brexit. It is hypocrisy that these so called Developed Western talk about difficulty of doing business in developing countries like India or China or African nations.

titre_com: My teen is without card since several‚Ä¶
commentaire: My teen is without card since several weeks. Again and again we are assured that a card has been sent, but no card ever arrived. There is no customer service. You are constantly wasting your time chatting with bots. If you have a real person (and you cannot really be sure of that because the answers are standardised) they promise to solve the problem but nothing happens. Yet, we have to pay for the card and the subscription. Kard does not share any proof that a card was ever sent. I have asked to be reimbursed and to receive my money back. We will see how long it takes. Great deception. It would be a good if they had customer service. Update: after several weeks and repeated lies about cards having been sent, I asked to close the account and be reimbursed. It is then that Kard informed me that their cards are out of stock! And they have no idea when cards will be restocked.

commentaire: I tried to open an account for my son. I did everything requested, and scanned my documents. I was told they were accepted. However, after three weeks, the card had not arrived. When I tried to login, I was told my email address did not exist.  One of the employees looked into the problem, and told me she could not understand. She later got back to me and told me that my identity card did not conform to French standard. This is very strange as I have a French identity card. I also do not understand why they did not tell me about this problem before.  From the small amount of experience I have with this company, I can see that they are not a company to trust.

commentaire: The bank has a cap on how many transactions you are allowed per month. I haven't been able to access my money for the past week and no one answers queries on weekends.In response to their response, their exceptional increase was permitting me 10 more contactless transactions in the month. I don't think raising a query Saturday morning and receiving a response Monday morning is sufficient, especially as I didn't have access to the money in my account all weekend and still don't, despite their response.La banque a un plafond sur le nombre de transactions que vous √™tes autoris√© par mois. Je n'ai pas pu acc√©der √† mon argent la semaine derni√®re et personne ne r√©pond aux questions le week-end.En r√©ponse √† leur r√©ponse, leur augmentation exceptionnelle me permettait 10 transactions sans contact de plus dans le mois. Je ne pense pas qu'il soit suffisant de poser une question le samedi matin et de recevoir une r√©ponse le lundi matin, d'autant plus que je n'ai pas eu acc√®s √† l'argent de mon compte tout le week-end et que je ne l'ai toujours pas, malgr√© leur r√©ponse.

titre_com: ‚ö†Ô∏è WARNING‚Ä¶ Do not trust your money with‚Ä¶
commentaire: ‚ö†Ô∏è WARNING‚Ä¶ Do not trust your money with Britline Credit Agricole Normandie.  June 2024:  My aunt recently passed away just under two years after opening her account with ‚ÄúBritline‚Äô Credit Agricole Normandie. We opened it as it offered English speaking customer service agents and as she was elderly and felt more comfortable speaking on the telephone rather than doing anything online.  Four months to the day after she passed away, I signed her succession documents in the Notaires office.  I noticed while going through the paperwork that the balance transferred to the Notaire‚Äôs account by CA Normandie ‚ÄòBritline‚Äô was different to the balance on the paperwork they had sent over for the balance on the date of her death. ‚Ç¨629.15c euros was missing. I asked her if the bank had sent a statement of transactions (debts) and interest accrued (credit) since my aunts death and she replied no. Over a three week period I rang the bank enquiring about this matter as a family member holding power of attorney and acting on behalf of the next of kin. The bank said they would only deal with the Notaire (French State Solicitor). I feel this was inreasonable. However when requesting three times over three separate phone calls that the bank send a full statement to the Notaire, they repeatedly failed to do this. I checked with the Notaire twice and she said she had received nothing in the form of a statement (debts/interest) originally from CA Normandie when they first sent my aunts bank date of death statement and nothing since explaining the charges. On contacting the bank the third time, they decided they would speak to me. I was able to find out where the ‚Ç¨629.15c went. ‚Ç¨9.15c was on a special ‚Äòdirect debit‚Äô (no explanation for what it was‚Ä¶ it just stated ‚Äòspecial direct debit‚Äô). The remaining ‚Ç¨620.00c was for ‚ÄòSuccession Documents‚Äô (Inheritance bank statement). These consisted of two A4 pages ‚ÄòBritline‚Äô had sent to the Notaire. These two pages listed the sole account number and ‚Äòbalance on date of death‚Äô on one page and a 9 line paragraph on the other page with the Notaires address and customers name and details. The nine lines was ‚Äòstandard phraseology‚Äô required information that would be expected on anyone‚Äôs bank statement. There were no special circumstances or further paperwork or explanations. When speaking to the same bank manager who opened the account two years earlier he talked for two minutes about ‚Äúall the reasons‚Äù for this ‚Ç¨620 charge. It was a lot of over inflated hot air. He even went as far as to state that ‚Äúdecisions about who the inheritors were..had to be made‚Äù. I had to point out that this was complete rubbish because one, that was the Notaire‚Äôs and State of France‚Äôs responsibility and two that had been established before the bank was even aware their client had died. He was just making rubbish up on the spot to try and justify a ‚Ç¨620 euro charge for sending out two A4 pages. In contrast, the accounts held by my aunt with Allied Irish bank, Bank of Scotland, The Halifax and La Poste, all sent out the same two A4 pages and‚Ä¶ their letters started with their condolences and some (even if fake) respect considering my aunts death. All those financial institutions didn‚Äôt charge a penny, not one penny to send out those same letters and the banks statement for each account.  When speaking to the manager, there was a distinct air of contempt as he ate food while talking on the phone and one could really sense the ‚ÄòI don‚Äôt give sh**‚Äô attitude hidden under the pretence of professionalism. Every time I pointed out something rel√®vent he simply replied ‚Äòuhmmm‚Ä¶‚Äô. Complete contempt for the situation. It made me completely aware that Britline saw opportunity for ‚Äòeasy money‚Äô ‚Ä¶someone else‚Äôs money as they rub their hands. Banks are banks‚Ä¶I‚Äôm no fool. They are just there to make money no matter how beautiful the Black horse advert is (Lloyd‚Äôs) or how the nice the individual person is you speak to in the moment. However a good judge of the quality of a bank is how they act when things are going wrong or you have a problem‚Ä¶ not when things are going well and you don‚Äôt need their help. I strongly advise potential customers to clearly understand what ‚Äòhidden‚Äô charges their bank has and ask direct straight questions when opening any bank account so you understand how you will be treated when you wish to close that account or transfer money.üî¥ I cannot recommend ‚ÄòBritline‚Äô CA NORMANDIE as a bank to trust your money with.  They failed to divulge to the Notaire what the charges were for. They failed to list any interest accrued even if it was zero (‚Ç¨0) and treated family members with contempt and the deceased‚Äôs bank account with opportunism.

I had a great experience with Pretto. Mehdi was consistently attentive, always following up on my project and adapting the plan to fit my research needs. He was honest throughout the entire process and ultimately secured a better deal for me. Working with them was straightforward and easy. I highly recommend Pretto for their professionalism and dedication.
Arthur is the best!You should use "english speaking" as your marketing strategy.I'm sure you'll gain a lot of customers with that.

As an expat working in France, I am very grateful to Louise who made it happen despite this difficult time. Indeed I had one offer so no choice to make, but still a much better rate than the one my friend got from another bank in one week time difference, so I am quite satisfied with it.She is professional, fast, always very reactive and easy to communicate. I totally recommend her.

Pretto team is very helpful, especially Oph√©lia who handled my case. I was abroad for almost 2 months and she managed to finding the best solution. Very assuring to have professionals answering my questions as it‚Äôs my first property purchase. Highly recommended!

commentaire: The beginning of the interaction went well, but the end of the discussion did not go well. We were told that my nationality was the problem and this was constantly frustrated. But at the end when we only had one bank, which we had already identified, we were also not provided the verbally agreed upon discount.

commentaire: We have had a wonderful experience with Pretto in our project. This is our second time dealing with an agency but the response time to our questions and queries was super quick at pretto.Mathieu, our agent was extremely patient and helpful as ours was quite a complex situation. With the right advice and a lot of patience, our dossier was  accepted successfully. These people are thorough professionals and know their job well. Thank you and hopefully many more with you.

titre_com: Crucial for expats trying to buy a property
commentaire: I'm not French and I don't know all the normal procedures in the country, so Pretto has been crucial to get along the process to buy a property in France.The negotiation gets a bit slower because there is an additional player, but you gain confidence since there is an agent helping you to identify the pros and cons with different properties, credit offers and so on. Similarly, the seller gains a bit more of confidence when you had a company backing up your buyer profile

I am very satisfied with Pretto, particularly Diane, for their outstanding loan brokerage service. Diane swiftly found a loan that perfectly suited my needs, even amidst rising interest rates. Initiating negotiations promptly, she secured an interest rate lower than the current average (-0,3).Diane's responsiveness and thorough answers to my questions made the process seamless. I highly recommend Pretto and would trust them again if needed.

I worked with Alban de Villele and he was excellent and very helpful in the full process. Explained all the details and speaks fantastic English also. He was very patient with all my questions and explained every detail. Thank you Alban and Pretto!

titre_com: We honestly cannot say enough good‚Ä¶
commentaire: We honestly cannot say enough good things about Pretto and in particular our account manager Mehdi. My husband and I are both non-French nationals and so we started out not knowing how the system would work as well as having a language barrier. After struggling on our own for over a year we found Pretto and Mehdi, from day one they were friendly and informative, highly responsive and super clear about what would happen next. The platform is great and you always know where you stand at a glance. We worried along the way that we would fall outside of the criteria for the loan, Mehdi fought for us for what we wanted to get and was honestly so reassuring along the way. He even went above and beyond with translation help and lots of last minute questions from us!! We went from almost giving up on getting our home to about to sign our last papers in a matter of months. The service is worth every penny to us and more. Our family is so very thankful to Mehdi and Pretto. If you are considering using Pretto we 100% recommend it. YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT!!!
With M. Benjamin Charnet, it is a very pleasant experience. His answers always come fast, detailed, and informative. Our financial project went very well! Highly recommend!

titre_com: My first real estate transaction in France is a success thanks to Pretto
commentaire: This is my first real state transaction in France, therefore I was not aware of all the steps in the process. First, I chose Pretto because of their simulation tool, which, instantly, gave me an idea of the amount and interest rate that I could borrow. Then, I was contacted by phone by Mehdi in a time slot that I selected, which made the start of the relationship pretty easy. With a busy agenda, I didn't have time to go to an office to meet someone, but I was able to meet Mehdi "face-to-face" thanks to a simple videoconferencing tool. Mehdi took the time to explain every step that would come and gave answers to all my questions. I appreciated Mehdi's professionalism and availability, as he was available by email, SMS & phone calls. He helped me to get the certificates that I needed super fast, to get my offer accepted by the seller. Mehdi helped me to get the loan very quickly with a competitive rate and credit conditions. I also appreciated the fact that he sent me reminders of steps that I needed to complete, so things could move forward quickly. The benefits I see of using Pretto are transparency, an easy platform to share information, a good balance of technology and human touch, fast and caring customer service, and successful communication and project coordinated by Mehdi with all the participants (real state agent, seller of the property, notary, bank, and customer: me). Thanks a lot for helping my project become a reality!
Eloi was exceptional!¬†Professional, reactive and creative. Also, many thanks to his right hand, Olivier C., for the added support and valuable input :).
Great website interface, easy to set up appointments and supply required documents. Our representative, Benjamin, was very knowledgeable and helped answer all of our questions.
Everything went very well. My consultant was very efficient and clear, despite my language barrier.

commentaire: Auto renewed without my agreement.I was told the auto renewal hidden in fine print, no translation, and I still cannot find it. Difficult to cancel. No contact email. From other reviews, it appears this happens a lot..Edit: I was told auto renew it's in terms and conditions on a personal space I do not have access to. I still cannot find it. I found the emails about auto renewal in my spam folder in a different language to my original agreement...In my opinion this is very dodgy business practice.Hopefully it is all cancelled now.
reponses:
Hey James,

Thank you for your feedback. At HEYME, our top priority is to ensure the satisfaction of all our members, and we apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Regarding the renewal of your contract, we understand your frustration, and we would like to inform you that your contract was tacitly renewed on 01/03/2023. We had sent a renewal email on 19/01/23, informing you of the possibility to cancel your contract in accordance with the Chatel law by submitting your request via our contact form before 01/03/2023.

We would also like to remind you that the tacit renewal clause was mentioned in the general conditions of your contract, which were accessible to you after subscription and are still available on your personal space.

Our commitment to transparency ensures that our members are well-informed about their contracts and renewal policies.

If you have any further concerns or questions regarding your contract, we would be happy to discuss them with you.

commentaire: Contacting you was the best decision. Thank you so much for helping me recover my money. Your service was very fast & user friendly. Would definitely use it again if needed.

We landed hours late in Lisbon after our flight from Cancun got delayed, and I didn't want to spend a lot of time writing (possibly several) letters to the airline myself. I wasn't quite sure which refund company to pick, but after a bit of research I picked RefundMyTicket. They did the job really well! No hassle, quick and painless, and they even refunded us more money than we expected (we thought the delay was under 4h, but their records had the flight at just over 4h late, which means we got refunded 600 euros per person instead of the 300 we initially claimed!)

titre_com: Efficient and Reliable Service from RefundMyTicket
commentaire: I am very satisfied with the service provided by RefundMyTicket. I received my refund , and their team responded quickly to my inquiries. Highly recommend!

titre_com: Be patient and believe it, it's really worth trying, but as an individual it would have been hopeless
commentaire: The team has been much more tenacious that I could have been myself ! Almost 4 years since the flight but the procedure finally turns into a great success I could never have obtained alone. Many thanks to RefundMyTicket !

Having my claim processed by RefundMyTicket was a smooth and painless experience. I appreciated being kept informed at every step of the process, and even more so the fact that I didn't need to do anything once I set the process in motion. The process can seem like it stretches on forever, and that makes not having to keep on top of it yourself even more of a relief. I sincerely hope I never have to submit a claim like this in the future, but if I do, I know exactly who to call.
After almost 8 months; I received my compensation. Thanks a lot to the team who help with my case.

Very efficient way of handling the claims and practical way to follow their status evolution.So far I had two claims for which refundmyticket managed to obtain the refund from the airline. So 100% success rate. Big thank you!
Still no communication since I wrote a negative review over 1 year ago. Refundmyticket please contact me about my claim which I put in in 2020 TTR-20200111-29252
reponses:

Our team just sent you an email at the address indicated on your Personal Area.
Your case had been closed because of extraordinary circumstances. In such case, the airline no longer have to pay any compensation.
We would also like to remind you that you can contact our customer service at the following address : help@refundmyticket.net

We remain at your disposal for any further question.

Kind regards,

RefundMyTicket Customer Care Team

commentaire: My flight to Berlin was delayed for more than 6 hours. I was so upset because I have an important event to attend, but I had no choice. I arrived 8 hours later. Happily RefundMyTicket team managed to get me the compensation I deserve for such a long delay. The procedure was super easy and I barely had to do many things that my money was in my account. Extremely thankful for that!

Easy and efficient online procedure. Make sure you provide all relevant documents / proof to ease the procedure! Mine took 3 months, since we were confronted with lack of co-operation from the airline.  RefundMyTicket managed to obtain a refund of a little bit over 200 ‚Ç¨ for a delayed departure of almost 5 hours. I am very satisfied and I highly recommend their services!

Wonderful service. They fought against the airline for a very long time (almost 4 years). Once everything was settled, we received the compensation in a short time, less than a month. I strongly recommend their service. Well done!

titre_com: The procedure was long but at the end I‚Ä¶
commentaire: The procedure was long but at the end I did receive my compensation. Perfect service.

This company takes your documents and doesnt follow up anything neither inform you nor reply you ever. In addition to that they receive your money but doesnt pay you anything. I had to hire and pay for another lawyer to receive my money from this company then they started taking me seriously and paid me within days. So stay away. Instead push the airline for your compensation. They get back to you sooner than this company trust me.

It is the second time that I use the service of Refund my ticket and both times I had a really good experience. Easy to submit the documents and twice a successful outcome! It is just a pity that airlines need this kind of nudge to abide by the EU laws!

titre_com: Wonderful I received my money in one‚Ä¶
commentaire: Wonderful I received my money in one month after filling the form

titre_com: Just over two years ago my Thai fiance‚Ä¶
commentaire: Just over two years ago my Thai fiance stayed with me, unfortunately she was admitted to hospital with a kidney infection. AXA were supposed to leaise with the hospital unfortunately that was not a success I ended up paying over 4000 euro to the hospital to avoid court action, now I am having difficulties communicating with AXA. And my groupama insurance are chasing AXA for me,they say AXA and the Hospital should have sorted the issue. Now I live in hope but won't use AXA again.
It's fast but no JCB credit card option for payment
Great website, easy to use and straightforward

Overall, at point of travel to find a right insurance is of utmost importance. Trust matters. Our trust for AXA is from the friends who have used it, and thus was immediately our first choice for my parents travel.
Signed my third insurance. Never had an issue with the service itself.Had a visa cancelled once and AXA refunded me the full amount!

The website is very simple to use to book a good travel insurance. Even when booking for someone else, which is the only reason I use it. Each time our organisation invites someone to our country, this is the insurance that we use (average, twice per year, at least for the last 2 years) & it ticks every box that the embassies that grant the visas look for. Luckily we've not had to use it for anything serious yet.

titre_com: good long term basic travel insurance coverage
commentaire: We travelled for almost 1 year around the world, so we needed a long term travel insurance that covers risks when we should get ill or have an accident i.e. doctor / hospital bills. our 6 year old got sick twice (hopefully nothing serious) and we needed to visit the private clinic in Bali and in Singapore. I had to fill in a form and send scans of the doctor / hospital report, invoice etc. It took a couple of weeks to hand in the docs asked by Chapka staff, but at the end we received full payment of all bills. Based on this, our experience with this agent was good and thus my 5-star rating of the personal experience I made with Chapka.

Fast answer and attention but I hope you know what‚Äôs your issue before going to the doctor, because if they don‚Äôt, and they need to do some tests/visits to you before, you won‚Äôt see this money back until they can tell you what‚Äôs wrong. So I hope you have a good budget and the doctors can tell it to you at the first visit, otherwise I wouldn‚Äôt even try it. I spent 300$ on tests+visits (only the 1st visit) and they couldn‚Äôt tell me what was wrong, but as you can understand, I don‚Äôt have an infinite budget to keep going there until they figure it out so I‚Äôve lost these 300 bucks. So, if you feel unwell but the doctors can‚Äôt find the illness, this company won‚Äôt pay any cost.
tr√®s rapide ;tr√®s simple

Bottom line: They will try not to pay you even when it's 100% proven they have to. I had an accident with surgery plus immobilization, all the hospital paperwork, all the reasons to be covered, but they found a way to evade their responsibilities. Could I prove I was not drunk while mountain biking? I could not. Don't buy anything from them, it will be money spent for nothing.

titre_com: Don‚Äôt trust the information Chapka give you
commentaire: The agent I talked to on the phone gave me the wrong information. I ended up subscribing to the wrong insurance for my world tour and not being insured while traveling. When I explained them I received the wrong information they just replied saying ‚Äúwe are sorry that you received the wrong information, we cannot do anything‚Äù. I now have to pay 2 insurances!

titre_com: Avoid Chapka if you value your money and health
commentaire: I recently purchased a year-long travel insurance policy with Chapka for worldwide coverage, and I have to say, it has been a terrible experience. I cannot recommend this insurance to anyone.During my trip to Vietnam, I needed to use the insurance for a medical issue. From the start, it was extremely difficult to get clear instructions from Chapka on how to proceed. Between Chapka and Axa, I received conflicting information on how to handle the claim. After three attempts and finally speaking to someone who seemed knowledgeable, I was instructed to visit the nearest hospital and keep all invoices, which I did.After my hospital visit, I contacted Axa as directed, but they told me they only cover expenses related to travel, such as taxi or hotel costs, and that medical expenses needed to be forwarded to Chapka. When I did this, I was met with rudeness from a representative named Richard Lam. He rudely told me that I shouldn‚Äôt have sent the medical expenses to him because Axa should cover them. I explained that Axa had already informed me they do not cover medical expenses and that Chapka, being the insurance company I purchased, should be responsible for resolving this, whether through Axa or directly.Richard continued to be extremely unhelpful and rude, stating that I should understand my policy better and because I didn‚Äôt call a specific French number before going to the hospital, my expenses would not be covered. I had actually called the number as per the instructions on the app, but Richard ignored this fact and eventually stopped responding to my emails altogether.The most frustrating part is that the expenses I was trying to claim from Chapka amounted to less than $40. If they can't even manage to cover such a small amount, I dread to think how they would handle a larger claim in a country like the US, where medical expenses can easily run into thousands of dollars just for a doctor's visit.$40 might not be a significant amount, but when you pay for insurance, you expect to receive the service you paid for. If Chapka couldn‚Äôt handle this trivial claim, I seriously question their ability to manage more substantial claims. As many other reviews stated, they‚Äôll do anything to not pay you, even if it‚Äôs obvious your claim should be covered by the insurance. Save your money and protect your health by choosing a reputable travel insurance company like HeyMondo or Iati. My family has used these companies in the past without any issues.Avoid Chapka at all costs!

We have suffered an accident with my wife and kid. Chapka has just avoided to give us any support for 10 days. After countless efforts from our part to contact them and send them the paperwork, they have just finally decided on Christmas Eve to answer that they will not cover the medical expenses for no reason and they have lied about our interaction with them. Avoid at all cost!!! You will save yourself from the anguish to deal with all of that in addition to the medical condition.

Don't use Chapka, It's almost a Fraud. More than 4 months to try to just get a feedback on my request (money back after a quick Doctor meeting) to finally get the answer to check with the S√©curit√© Sociale (Public Insurance) and ask them directly.It's just impossible to get any reimbursement from them

Literally the worse insurance.This got recommended by a friend and I am furious that I trusted them.I spent hundreds to get a 12-month cover, and they have refused to refund any of my general consultations, even though it clearly states in the conditions that they refund these. I fought for weeks for my first few appointments, to which they finally caved, but I'm having yet another fight with them to gain a simple refund. 100% do not recommend.

My wife under VISA using this insurance went to the doctor for an emergency. Only asking the reimbursment for a doctor consultation and a few cheap medicine (about 30‚Ç¨). They refuse to reimburse telling us a call was needed prior going to the doctor. Nothing mention that on my contract, and they were unable to prove it, however they still refuse to reimburse. It means this insurance is completly useless, an other  business based on money theft in the "startup nation" we are living in...

titre_com: Worst customer service I‚Äôve never seen
commentaire: Worst customer service I‚Äôve never seen( from the manager which is even worse). Literally the lady screamed on me, and  told me¬´¬†close it please¬†¬ª. Took me 1month to have a random refund for a cream that I sent 3 TIMESSS the photos of the prescription and they couldn‚Äôt find it and reply me ( you don‚Äôt have any prescription sorry...) I‚Äôd never recommend this company at anyone

For a year I used an Working Holiday insurance with Chapka. Never got sick, never went to the doctor. Suddenly, a red rash starts spreading on my foot. It drives me nuts! It hurts, burns, etc. I make a doctors appointment (which costs me over ‚Ç¨300), the doctor fills in the Chapka fill out form, I pay, get the receipt, etc. To make a long story short, after months, I am still writing emails every day to ask my money back. The state they send me the money to my Mastercard, but I never paid my Chapka insurance with a Mastercard. This is pure fraud!

titre_com: Cover is too basic, refunds aren't straightforward and streamlined.
commentaire: I am giving Chapka a 1 out of 5 because they are an extremely basic cover and did not reimburse me for any of my new medical bills on the basis that nothing I got was covered by them. Their refund claiming process is also extremely complicated and not streamline at all. Clearly they try and make it as difficult as possible for their customers to get refunded. Multiple times I have had to chase them for answers as well.I regret signing up with them and do not recommend their services at all.

BIG SCAM,I got this insurance for Canada and only AFTER I paid and signed they sent the the REAL contract where it clearly stated that the insurance DIDN‚ÄôT cover for Canada. I asked for money back and they responded with ‚Äúyou can‚Äôt. Also you cannot expect everyone to know our insurance‚Äù

Worst insurance company ever. I got injured, they told me I would be reimbursed on the phone, and now they refuse to reimburse me because they say I should keep travelling! Of course if I was not injured I would have kept travelling!!! I cancelled my surf trip with a broken shoulder I'm not gonna go there and watch people surf. To be clear I'm not asking them to pay for the cancellation fees of the surf trip, I'm asking them to pay for the doctors I've seen for my broken shoulder. Shoulder that I broke ON A TRIP ABROAD, while I was insured on their contract.

titre_com: Chapka are the insurance company for‚Ä¶
commentaire: Chapka are the insurance company for the cancellation insurance when I made a campervan booking via Yescapa.com . I had to cancel the trip due to the illness of a family member. They refuse to pay out for no legitimate reason and I have lost 800 Euros.

Hassle for nothingif there was a zero, I would give them a zero.It's all a very unnecessary hassle. For nothing. They are not reliable and they refuse to pay. I have been waiting since November last year.I had to go to a hospital in Colombia, i did everything they asked me: call them beforehand to get a case number, got confirmation documents from my home insurance provider, then provided all documents via email and also send them by post - and still nothing. I have not heard from them and when I call i am rudely transferred around.Also, it is not sufficient to send scans, for some reason, they need papers, even if the documents are not originals but copies.It's just...bad and annoying.Go with a different insurance, avoid Europ Assistance or Chapka.

titre_com: Holiday cancellation due to unexpected pregnancy.
commentaire: We have worldwide travel insurance with Allianz as part of our Platinum NatWest bank account. We had to make a difficult decision to cancel a holiday to the Maldives on the advice of a doctor due to a very unexpected pregnancy and the Maldives having a risk of Zika virus. NatWest terms and conditions stated that we would be covered for cancellation if I had fallen pregnant unexpectedly and a doctor advised us not to travel, which was the case so we were fairly hopeful and confident the claim would be hassle free. We submitted our claim via the online hub and were asked to provide the booking confirmation, cancellation invoice, medical report confirming pregnancy and a medical certificate from the doctor justifying the reason for cancellation. Within 3 months of opening the claim, we had the full amount of money we had lost (minus the excess) in our bank account so an excellent experience and outcome. My only reason for not giving 5 stars is because communication was very slow and sporadic (one or two emails within that time requesting further information or giving us an update. Emails that I initiated were not responded to), but apart from that, we are very happy and relieved. Thank you Allianz/Natwest.

Please Don't Buy This Insurance. I'm completely unsatisfied as I literally paid around ¬£60 & when my luggage arrived, it was damaged & I only bought it a couple of days before my holiday. I phoned them today & they asked me to pay ¬£75 just to investigate my situation. This is honestly rip-off & I won't buy any Travel Insurance in the future. I hope this helpss!!

2024/0807746 Paid deposit ¬£150 for a Warners Holiday with Grand UK Holidays took out insurance but decided to cancel as my husband has CKD and wasn‚Äôt well enough to go as now in stage 5.Contacted insurance company who finally offered ¬£50 which I disagreed with but they don‚Äôt want to know stopped excepting emails and when I try to phone I get cut off. Do not touch this company they are disgraceful shouldn‚Äôt be allowed to sell insurance.

titre_com: Lack of communication, unhelpful claim system, not fit for purpose
commentaire: We submitted a claim for a cancelled holiday in January 2024 and uploaded paperwork supporting this, as required by Allianz. Numerous phone calls over the months since, instigated  by me,  to try to discover what is happening, where each time I am asked for different information ( often duplicating what is there). The last two occasions I have been assured the evidence has been provided, yet we still hear absolutely nothing. This company is absolutely appalling at getting in touch. There is no opportunity on the ‚Äòtrack your claim‚Äô on line system to actually communicate so you are left helpless. Despite pleasant representatives on the phone,  who appear to listen,  and apparently check information and add relevant notes on file etc. it never seems that  information is actually logged.  We are absolutely no further forward with our claim and the frustration is mounting. I would not touch Allianz again - There is absolutely no peace of mind given with this insurance.

titre_com: My claim wasn‚Äôt reviewed - 10 months wait.
commentaire: In 2023 I was on holiday with my family and ended up in hospital with a really bad bacterial infection - I called Allianz before going to the hospital for assistance to make sure I would follow the terms of my insurance. Now it‚Äôs been 10 months I opened the claim with Allianz, and I still haven‚Äôt received any money from my expenses. I called them again today to learn that my claim hasn‚Äôt even been reviewed yet: 2023/5115295.The customer service team is always nice on the phone, but that doesn‚Äôt help us if the insurance actually doesn‚Äôt work and claims are not reviewed- even after such a long period. If you can‚Äôt count on your insurance company in case of an emergency, what would you need them for? From now on I‚Äôll have to call them EVERY DAY, and I‚Äôll be using a different company for my summer trips this year. I recommend everyone else does the same.

Have Worldwide go comprehensive insurance with Allianz New Zealand. Claimed for travel disruption. After 21 days I had to ring them to find out what's going on. No reply. Thier site said "Claim processed and information sent to customer!". Yet nothing received. No response to emails. Phone calls made with no answers given by customer service staff. Promises made yet not kept. Asked to be escalated to manager but no manager available. 5 weeks Later still nothing. Have given up. And written off ALLIANZ New Zealand as a   bad joke.First claim in 9 years of insurance With them. NEVER AGAIN! Don't WASTE YOUR MONEY!!! "Allianz NZ customer service is a disgrace' but it's Thier bad management that sets the protocol, systems and processes.

I was unable to fly home from America as the airline wouldn't allow my daughter to fly due to illness. We had to stay two extra nights and pay to see a doctor. I have made a complaint and heard nothing regarding my claim or the complaint.
2 months to call to look into travel claim, go elsewhere. NatWest is a shambles even using this crap company.

Totally hopeless, don't answer phone calls, don't answer emails, the guy who made the quote is on leave and his boss won't make a decision before his return? Sounds like one man company? The changed the IT system and lost the file, so they can extend one month by charging 2 months with 50% discount what is this BS ? They out of this world and treat clients with disdain and disrespect...

Convicted fraudsters. False advertising. Say they agreed to settle but keep losing all my details to be able to make the settlement, contact you asking for the 7th time for their own documents, then ignore you in the hope that you will give up.

People please don‚Äôt use this insurance company!!!!!!You book travel insurance, only to find when you make a claim they have only covered you for one day.  They do this on purpose to take your money and then don‚Äôt pay out.  This is how they operate.  Their staff don‚Äôt understand what‚Äôs going on, they push you from pillar to post.  Such inefficient service.  This was submitted in August last year, they keep you hanging on a string for months on end, then they decline the claim saying ‚Äúyou were only covered for a day‚Äù and they are laughing all the way to the bank.  Something needs to get done to make the public aware of their tactics!!!!!!!!They don‚Äôt even deserve a 1 for their service - it‚Äôs-1000 üò°üò°üò°üò°

Wow, I'm just shocked.   This company doesn't care about their costumers at all.    People stay away,  don't buy this insurance, they don't pay any claims.  Read the other reviews. My claim is covered, but they refuse to pay it. Also,  they can't even specify why is not covered. What a joke. wow

Allianz Travel Insurance - very bad experience. An advisor confirned that my family travel claim due to a cancelled flight would be covered including replacement flights, car hire etc so I went ahead and rebooked at a cost of ¬£1.8k - even though Allianz have admitted their advisor gave the wrong information - the claim and complaint have been rejected without recourse to the assurances provided by their employee. Have any others had this experience as considering collective legal action?

titre_com: I had a heart attack the worst service imaginable.
commentaire: I had a heart attack while abroad, in May 2022. Now it‚Äôs October 2023 and hospital and ambulance bills are still not paid, despite an order from Financial Ombudsman to sort it out.  Debt collectors are now chasing me. Numerous letters and phone calls to Allianz get no result. Lloyds uses Allianz for their premium platinum customers.They should reconsider.

No help and no understanding of my frustration.she simply stated that she couldDo nothing for me and that my insurance isn‚Äôt covered. She seemedHappy to punish me for not being informed onThe protocol.  Terrible experience.

Basically, they won't pay out on genuine claims... use another travel insurer. Have the policy through our bank account but wish I'd used someone else. Provided all the info requested and then had the claim refused ('wrong type of Covid test' - I was not advised when I made the claim and di exactly as I was instructed) and now asking for proof of being unfit to fly - so they've just changed the parameters. Appalling. So depressing to now see that everyone else treated badly as well. Shame on Allianz.

Paid for missed event insurance. Daughter caught a contagious disease and couldn't attend event.Tried email and calling for a claim. 20 minutes on hold on a chargeable line - no answer. Found the landline number from other websites, nobody answers.No reply to emails. They take your money and provide nothing in return, that's just theft. Allianz are crooks, scammers and thieves.It's cheaper to lose the face value of the tickets than to lose that and a useless insurance premium.
This is a good company.

So I was not able to meet the requirements of Allianz. They are slow to respond and then give you a "Final reminder". Save your money and buy a good meal with it.

Since I arrived in Australia I have needed twice to see a doctor. Yupwego has always been pretty quick to respond and allowed me to go to the doctor without any questions. However, getting reimbursed for awfully complicated...The first time, I waited 2 months to get 50$ back. The second time I went to the doctor, they send me a form to fill out in order to claim my money back and because I couldn't fill it out on my laptop and did not have access to a printer they offered me to send me the form to my address. It was a few weeks ago and I still have received nothing so I decided to CANCEL this insurance and use a local one (which I should have done from the start). Overall, I don't recommend this travel insurance.

titre_com: I paid for travel insurance - they did not send contract
commentaire: I paid for travel insurance, using PayPal according to their instructions. After that I did not receive contract or confirmation. After my inquiry on their helpdesk, they are not responsive, gave some answer after day, that payment was not done. After I send them the transaction ID, they did not answer at all. I can say or it is scam or it is very bad company for this kind of service.
reponses:
Dear Sir,

We have sent you the contract. There was a misunderstanding as you did not specify you made the payment via PayPal. We cannot respond to you outside of our working hours. It is indeed very easy to blame the other party when you are at fault. Afterward, you canceled the payment, we were then obliged to cancel your contract.

commentaire: Off to a bad start. Tried to pay by card with 4 different cards, 3 different banks, 12 hours apart during business hours. It kept failing with Unknown error, please try later.I reached out to customer service and they were responsive and sent me a PayPal link but it had an additional processing fee (3‚Ç¨) which I don¬¥t know why I have to pay when it¬¥s their system not working.
reponses:
Dear customer,

It seems the transaction was not accepted by the payment platform we work with.

We propose the payment via PayPal or bank transfer in this case as a solution. Unfortunately, there is an extra fee for PayPal payments.

titre_com: Customer care is very easy to connect‚Ä¶
commentaire: Customer care is very easy to connect to and very attentive. Pricing of product is very good also, although we have never made a claim so we cannot comment on this part of service.

I have used Mondiale care insurance several times now for my visa applications. Last time my parent's visa got rejected and they simply changed the dates for me for the next application. They have always amended any changes I needed to do in the insurance certificate promptly and responded friendly in whatsapp. I am very happy with their service!

titre_com: My mother couldn't breathe and had high‚Ä¶
commentaire: My mother couldn't breathe and had high infection level suddenly 4 days after arrival. Her oxygen levels dropped drastically, so all this was not a ' pre-existing ' condition and very critical to even wait for 1 day! Mondial rejected the claim saying waiting period is 7 days..does that even make sense? In an emergency situation? Wait till the patient dies? Is that the point? The policy was bought months before travel period began. This is an absolute scam. Not just that, the manager who responded was ludicrous and couldn't even understand the doctors report but had sarcasm drippy from his report! Pathetic company with horrible employees.
reponses:
Dear Saikat Chatterjee,

We understand that you do not agree with the response from our claim department.

Let us explain to you the contract you have subscribed to is a Schengen travel medical insurance.
There is a waiting period of seven days as written in your policy documents.

You can see below the definition as written on page 4 of the Schengen policy terms and conditions attached to the email sent to you when you subscribed to the contract.

WAITING PERIOD: This is the period between the date of entry into force of the contract and the opening of the rights to compensation during which the guarantees do not apply. Medical expenses relating to conditions and illnesses that manifested themselves during the waiting period are excluded from the cover.

The contract started on 30/05/2023 and the hospitalization took place on the 3rd of June 2023, five days after the entry into force of the contracts.

Furthermore, it is written in the medical report the insured was hospitalized in May 2023 for this precise medical condition.

We are sorry but this case cannot be covered.

commentaire: We were waiting for the Portugal Visa to come through and expected to need the MONDIALCARE insurance starting on or around the first day of the following month. In the event the Visa did not arrive and we decided to allow another full month. Moving the period is forward is easy online but had unfortunately I left it too late (3day before if I remember correctly). I wrote an email and the problem was solved. Thanks

I want to express my gratitude to the company and personally to the manager named Maria! Thanks to her professionalism and competence, I was able to quickly issue and receive an insurance policy, which was extremely difficult in my conditions. Maria has been advising me grammatically all the way! Me and my husband ask the management to encourage Maria for her work! I couldn't have done it without her help. Thank you!!!

They performed very fast and well when I needed it. They always replied all my questions and doubts. I recommend to contract your insurance with them. They are a very efficient and serious company.

titre_com: Got the best price for the Schengen‚Ä¶

commentaire: Date of experience: May 28, 2024

I subscribed to a Schengen insurance to travel to France, called ‚Äúassurance-voyage-schengen‚ÄùDuring my stay I had a medical problem, so I went to see a doctor.Then I gave all the doctor's prescriptions to this insurance, but the insurance refused to reimburse my medical expenses!the insurance said that she wanted more details of the disease and the symptoms and their origin! the insurance clearly asked that the doctor breaks the medical secret.the doctor gave me a certificate, but did not want to break the medical secret.The doctor even proposed to discuss with the referring doctor of the insurance but the insurance first said that their referring doctor (each insurance has a referring doctor to validate the clients' files) was not entitled, while it is false because the dialogue between doctors is authorized by the order of doctors.So everything is done to not pay you back, because they know very well that we will not take a local lawyer and make them a trial because it will cost us more money!So this insurance is to AVOID!
reponses:
Hello
I am in charge of customer relations for Schengen Travel Insurance and I am aware of your dissatisfaction.
First of all, I remind you that this travel insurance policy, like all contracts of this type, never deals with the consequences and consequences of pre-existing illness and that is why you have been asked for additional information. during your statement and it would have been much simpler to answer under the covertness of confidentiality because our administrative team is entitled to this.
For the question concerning the contact with the doctor of our support platform, I am quite surprised by the facts you mention and I invite you to contact our team again so that the connection with the doctor is done without difficulties.

titre_com: Contract scam! You pay 30% if you leave
commentaire: I am very sorry for having allowed myself to be seduced by the promises of the person who proposed a professional advancement in my desperate search for evolution. Once the contract was signed (online), the problems began with contacting the teachers, who were supposed to know about my case as an employee with a particular work schedule. In the trial months of the training I was NEVER able to contact any teacher, and my counselor did not answer my calls or my calls. Added to all this is that the only time I managed to establish contact with the administration of the training center they demanded that despite the problems that I should not stop paying the monthly payment and that they would do "everything possible" to solve my problems. concerns.... something that they never managed to solve.  and in the end I had to abandon the training within the established period (3 months), but not before paying 30% of the entire training (‚Ç¨1,300), all of this as part of a penalty for not completing the program.

titre_com: The idea is good by 1 star for the‚Ä¶
commentaire: The idea is good by 1 star for the following reasons:After doing some courses in Udemy and DataScientest:1. DataScientest tutors and graders are doing this as a side job; they have with little or no interest on teaching. So far, all courses start by ‚ÄúI didnt prepare anything for this meeting‚Ä¶‚Äù and they do not know what are in the actual courseS2. The material and tools are ok but considering that udemy is 10 euros a month (a fraction of this program price) and offers the same tools and products it is quite disappointing.3. Communication is terrible; there is slack but there are no replies from the staff (2-3 weeks later and I am still waiting for their responses)4. Well udemy you dont get feedback from anyone but even if I ask for feedback in datascientest for my test i get nothing. Just ‚Äúgood job‚Äù or ‚Äútry again!‚Äù While i am constantly asking for more feedback.Overall, if this is paid by the government it might be ok but if I had to pay it myself then I would have stick to udemy or any other educational app.
It is an amazing program. I attended MLOps bootcamp.

This company is a NIGHTMARE. DevOps Bootcamp is a joke, they charge 6k and when I asked for a call with someone that could answer couple of my questions - I am waiting more than two weeks for a teacher and still nobody got back to me. This is just one abstraction among many other. Would never buy it again.

Je suis tr√®s satisfait de ma formation de Data Scientist au sein de DataScientest. Apr√®s un rapide test d‚Äôadmission, on plonge tr√®s vite dans le vif du sujet. L‚Äôenvironnement d‚Äôapprentissage √† distance semblable √† celui du monde de l‚Äôentreprise est optimum. Le contenu de la formation est de tr√®s bonne qualit√©. Comme attendu il y a un bon rythme d‚Äôapprentissage (format bootcamp) mais bien cadr√© dans un agenda avec des points r√©guliers et des d√©livrables/examens. Cette formation laisse une place importante √† l‚Äôautonomie, en cas de difficult√©, l‚Äô√©quipe p√©dagogique sait r√©pondre‚Ä¶ Enfin, le dipl√¥me est reconnu ! On se sent op√©rationnel √† la fin de la formation, je recommande !-------------------------------------------------I really enjoyed learning Data Science at DataScientest (in a bootcamp mode) (in France) (and get my diploma by the way). In a nutshell, the training environment is nice, it is most of the time in remote, the content is online, up to you to manage your time, but you have regular meetings and an agenda for your exams to make sure you will reach the final target (the rhythm is quite intense, especially in boot camp mode). In case of something not easy, the support is always there. I recommend!
